channel.title: Pages on All about Raspberry Pi
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on All about Raspberry Pi

item.title: Big Image Sample
item.author: hugozhu@gmail.com (Hugo Zhu)
item.description: The image banners at the top of the page are refered to as “bigimg” in this theme. They are optional, and one more more can be specified. If more than one is specified, the images rotate every 10 seconds. In the front matter, bigimgs are specified using an array of hashes.

item.title: About me
item.author: hugozhu@gmail.com (Hugo Zhu)
item.description: My name is Hugo Zhu. Please contact me at hugozhu at gmail.com https://www.linkedin.com/in/hugozhu/ Friendly Links: 7sGood: https://www.7sgood.com VidHub: https://apps.apple.com/app/apple-store/id1659622164?pt=118612019&ct=hugo&mt=8
